text:
Hypnosis was another technique used in MKUltra. Researchers attempted to

induce a hypnotic state in participants, making them more susceptible to

suggestions and manipulation (2).

Psychoactive Substances

MKUltra researchers also experimented with psychoactive substances,

including LSD, to manipulate behavior and extract information from

individuals. These experiments were often conducted in secret, without proper

oversight or informed consent (3).
